snippet: Mr. Novick, a history professor, contended in “The Holocaust in American Life” that the legacy of the Nazi genocide unduly dominated American Jewish identity.
abstract: Peter Novick, history professor who stirred controversy in a 1999 book about the legacy of the Holocaust, dies at age 77.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Novick, a history professor, contended in “The Holocaust in American Life” that the legacy of the Nazi genocide unduly dominated American Jewish identity.

headline.seo: Peter Novick, Wrote Divisive Holocaust Book, Dies at 77
headline.main: Peter Novick, Wrote Controversial Book on Holocaust, Dies at 77
headline.print_headline: Peter Novick, 77, Author of Holocaust Book
